law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1273, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 253, sec. 6, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 144, sec. 10, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 150, sec. 4, effective June 24, 2003. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 476, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000.
